data.name: The Devils - A Visual Novel Of WWII
data.detailed_description:
1945. During the final days of World War II, two Japanese soldiers struggle to make it through a deadly island swamp as the unforgivable sins of their less honorable Japanese soldier comrades come back to exact their bloody revenge.

In this visual novel you will witness Takahiro and Yabu's struggles during their forced march through the deadly swamps of Ramree Island, hunted by their enemies and haunted by the horrors they were forced to be part of, by their dehumanized comrades

Features:
  • 2D linear playing.
  • Complex story featuring multiple themes where either choice made by the characters have dire consequences.
  • Immersive graphics based on the comic series from ROKiT Comics
  • Rich music score
  • Superb visual effects.

data.short_description: A graphic novel about a true life horror story rooted at the end of World War II

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, including the Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64 bit supporting MacOS version
  • Processor: Intel architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, including the Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64 bit supporting distro
  • Processor: Any x86/64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, including the integrated ones
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: This Novel contains imagery and themes associated with war, such as violence, gore, rape, torture, nudity, etc. The content is not appropriate for minors
